artefact.overview: You need to register with an accreditation scheme to be an energy assessor in England and Wales
artefact.licence_short_description: You need to register with an accreditation scheme to be an energy assessor in England and Wales.
artefact.licence_overview: To operate as an energy assessor you must be a member of an accreditation scheme which covers the types of work you undertake and is approved by the Secretary of State.
